name: Minister Ichikami
skill: Restores 1340/1640 HP to 2 allies (ranged priority). Targets recieve 54%/66% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Moderately increases Crit DMG of Festival Doll team members.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the dolls put on display during the Doll Festival. The spirit of the Minister of the Left, which is displayed on the fourth tier of the Doll Festival stand. Her job is to gaurd Ohina and Odairi, but she is so infatuated with Ohina that she doesn't seem to care for Odairi very much, and has a sharp attitude toward him.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Clear Chapter 3.
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Exchange for 1000 Hishi Mochi
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a Second Half Ranking of 2501-6000.
◦ "The Spirits' Doll Festival" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5001-7500.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Hishi Mochi during the "The Spirits' Doll Festival" event.

main: "Where is the cur that is bothering Lady Ohina?"
skill: "No matter what may come, I will protect you."
limit_break: "All that I am is for my empress!"
